NEW FEATURES: The `setColor` command is now available! You can now set a custom accent color for your profile.
IMPROVEMENTS: Bastion will now auto check for updates on start and install them if you'd like.
The `guide` command is now an alias for the all new `help` command
Some under-the-hood changes & improvements, to make Bastion even better.
FIXES: Some under-the-hood fixes, as usual, to improve Bastion.
